member.name: T:Behavior.PlayerBullet
member.summary: Gives objects basic bullet properties. They damage enemies on impact, and disintegrate after a certain amount of time. These bullets are meant to be fired by the player, as they do not damage the player.

member.name: T:Behavior.HeldWeapon
member.summary: Gives the weapon object its basic behaviors, such as being attached to the player, and reflecting the sprite of the currently held item.

member.name: T:Camera.CameraFollow
member.summary: A component that causes the object it is placed on to follow a target.

member.name: T:Player.Controller2D
member.summary: Does a majority of the calculations for the platformer movement system.

member.name: T:Player.PlayerController
member.summary: Utilizes Controller2D to perform calculations and take input from the player for movement.

member.name: T:Manager.WeaponDatabaseManager
member.summary: Builds database with weapon stats from JSON file and compiles them into a list.
